title: Thomas Merton: Spiritual Direction and Meditation
author: Thomas Merton
description: Merton, whose own tortuous path to spiritual maturity is well known, here offers the knowledge gained during that experience. He discusses the meaning and purpose of spiritual direction, and how to profit from that direction.
